long_description: The wide-brimmed Wallaroo Platypus Hat gives your little girl the sun protection she needs, along with fun graphics and splashes of color that will get her excited to play outside. With a UPF 50+ rating, soft cotton fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Hand wash the Wallaroo Playtpus Hat in cold water.
short_description: The wide-brimmed Wallaroo Platypus Hat gives your little girl the sun protection she needs, along with fun graphics and splashes of color that will get her excited to play outside.
